description: The main tower structure at Enies Lobby where the final battle between Luffy and Rob Lucci takes place. This is where CP9 brought Nico Robin and Franky for judgment.

keyMoments.title: Site of Luffy vs Lucci Conclusion
keyMoments.description: The Tower of Justice serves as the battleground for the climactic conclusion of Luffy vs. Lucci, with Luffy's Jet Gatling sending Lucci crashing through the tower wall.
keyMoments.significance: The location of one of the most important battles in the Water 7 saga.

significance: Central location for the Enies Lobby arc's climax

description: The long bridge connecting the main island to the Tower of Justice at Enies Lobby. Named the Bridge of Hesitation because criminals would hesitate before crossing it to face judgment.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Battles Shu
keyMoments.description: Zoro fights Marine Captain Shu on the Bridge of Hesitation, where his sword Yubashiri is destroyed.
keyMoments.significance: Location where Zoro suffers a significant loss.

keyMoments.title: Franky Defeats Very Good
keyMoments.description: Franky battles and defeats Marine Captain Very Good on the bridge during the Buster Call.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky fighting alongside the Straw Hats.

significance: Key battleground during the Enies Lobby escape

description: A World Government judicial island where criminals are brought for judgment before being sent to Impel Down. Known as the island that never sleeps due to perpetual daylight.

keyMoments.title: Marines Announce Lucci's Defeat
keyMoments.description: The announcement of Rob Lucci's defeat reverberates throughout Enies Lobby, shocking all Marine forces.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a humiliating defeat for the World Government at their own judicial stronghold.

significance: One of the three major World Government strongholds
